text: The flag of Lugo () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the with of the center. The ratio of the flag is 2:4. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF == Other flags == Image:Bandera de Lugo.png|Flag of Lugo (1942).
